text: Rodrigo Alberto de Jes√∫s Chaves Robles (born 10 June 1961) is a Costa Rican politician. He is the 49th President of Costa Rica since 2022. Chaves was Minister of Finance during the presidency of Carlos Alvarado Quesada from 2019 until 2020. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1961 births Category:Presidents of Costa Rica Category:Current national leaders
title: Rodrigo Chaves Robles
